effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves a minccino into cinccino, a roselia into roserade, or a togetic into togekiss.
effect_entries.short_effect: Evolves a Minccino into Cinccino, a Roselia into Roserade, or a Togetic into Togekiss.

flavor_text_entries.text: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It shines with a dazzling light.
